The element which is adding to the library must have a name. The element which 
is created by the library element factory will have a default name if the name 
is not given.

Make not null names for elements created from library ElementFactory. So that,
inserting elements won't throw exceptions.

traces.message: The Label is not  allowed to be added into the Library's slot components because it does not  have a name.
